text: Mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar Zisas ndava khavgim, ana Fhe Bakɨme ndikndigap khaŋ ana nzuai, “O, Fhe, ndu kha nuian gum buiva gari Guma Bakɨme ma. Gu ne nzuav ndu zɨ ndi vun kuamkuagi. Ndu khaŋ muuŋgi ne nzuav, ndu kha bigin kha ndɨkndɨgi ga mbui gumgi vhagi. Mbe kha ndɨkndɨgi ga mbui. Mbe ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ kaŋgiap ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ga mbui gumgi ma. Ndu ntan mba tarire ndɨkndɨgi ndɨkndɨga mbui gumgi, ndu ntan mbe khɨvigi. Ahaŋ, ne nzerara, Fhe Bakɨme, ndu wo vuzvuga zɨn vov maaŋ muuŋgi.”
